div.head: Copia
div.p:
Nouerint vniuersi et singuli presentes litteras inspecturi nos prepositum balliuos consules
communitatem burgi de Abirdene teneri ac fidemedia firmiter obligari excellentissimo
immitissimo principi Jacobi dei gracia Regi nostro Scotorum illustrissimo in summa decem
lastarum salmonum bonorum et legalium piscium et sufficientis mensure dicti burgi pro
quadam certa pecunie summa nobis fideliter persoluta Soluendarum et duce domino delibe
randarum apud dictum burgum de abirdene ad festum ad vincula Sancti petri proximum et
immediate futurum post datam presencium sine vlteriori dilacione / quibuscumque factoribus
aut cuicumque factori pluribus aut vni eiusdem excellentis principis et Regis nostri illus
trissimi prelibati Regnj incolis seu quibuscumque aliis personis mercatoribus ciuibus
et eorum deputatis uel deputandis vbilibet infra Regnum Anglie francie flandrie
holandrie zelandrie vel quarumcumque aliarum parcium vltra marinarum limites
de gentibus cum quibus contigerit quemcumque nomine factorio prefati domini nostri Regis
excellentissimj personis agendis merces contrahere / et contrahendo dictos sal
mones statuto et preordinato tempore deliberandos fore promittere absque
qualicumque impedimento in contrarium opponendo per nos aut nostros quomodolibet in
futuro Ad quam quidem solucionem dictarum decem lastarum salmonum bonorum
et legalium piscium sufficientis que mensure ad tempus preaffixum in dicto
burgo quibuscumque personis factorio nomine Supremj domini nostri Regis ante dicti
Regnj incolis aliis ve mercatoribus ciuibus et eorum deputatis in Regno Anglie
parciumque vltra marinarum quarumcumque limitibus commorantibus ut prefertur
bene et fideliter fiendam complendam et integraliter satisfaciendam obliga
mus nos et nostrum quemlibet coniunctim et divisim ac omnia bona nostra mobilia
et immobilia presencia et futura in strictissima obligacionis concipiende forma
omnibus dolo et fraude penitus a motis et seclusis In cuius rei testimonium
nostrum Sigillum communem presentibus est appensum apud dictum burgum de Abirdene
penultimo die mensis nouembris anno Domini millesimo CCCCmo octuagesimo quinto
Curia tenta per balliuos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xo die Decembris anno et cetera lxxxv

quo die ballivi per decretum curie assignauerunt Willelmo more diem lune pro
pro die peremptorio ad respondendum Willelmo portar pro iniusta detencione xv solidorum ab ea
de argento accomodato

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis
Decembris anno predicto /

quo die Willelmus more calumpniavit Willelmum portar tanquam de
bitorem pro nobili domino magistro de huntle pro iniusta detencione iiijor libre pro mercimoniis
et denariatis receptis ab vxore eiusdem Willelmi more vnde Willelmus portar
peciit diem legalem ad respondendum Willelmo more super dicta summa vt acquirat principalem debitorem
negando quod deuenit debitor vxori Willelmi more pro huiusmodi summa / et ballivi / ad respondendum
assignauerunt Willelmo portar diem Juridicum post festum nativitatis Domini nostri

Eodem die assisa decreuit Willelmum more soluere debere Willelmo portar xv s' infra
terminum Juris de argento accomodato / quia ipse Willelmus more refutavit Juramentum sibi oblatum per
assisam quod non debuit dictam summam

Assisa Alexander rede Johannes Wormot thomas prat gilbertus vaus andreas murray senior robertus
prat Johannes more henricus owrum patricius andirson David galichtly Johannes lammynton Johannes
portar et Ricardus bernys quj Jurati ad determinandum actionem motam per Willelmum blindsel
aduersus Willelmum more penes dimidium laste corriorum continuaverunt determinacionem eiusdem vsque hodie ad octo
dies / et iniugitur partibus quod tunc producant documenta sua prout voluerint prodere et lucrare et cetera

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xix dai of Decembre
the assise chosin betuix William blindsel and Wil more has deliuerit and ordanit
that the said William more sal make a bil of compt and rekning til Wilyeam blind
sel again the law dai of this burgh eftir yule next tocum of the selling and waring
of demj last of hidis like as he wil preve at the ordinance of the assis' that dai

Item the ballies has assignit til Wilyam more the sammyn law dai eftir yule to preve
that James colison is awand til him twa franch' crovnis

Item the said William more is ordanit be ane sworne assise topay til James
colison vj s' acht til him within terme of law

The penult dai of Decembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv . the Aldirman and counsale has
promittit and grantit til murtho glenmaluin for the outred and payment of a gowne
til Richart boyl / that the said murtho salhaf tharfor the erast burges or twa
forstallaris at his awne liking til compone with thame and nane vtheris
quhil he be content and assithit / witnes heirof Johne of Knollis William
blindsel ane of the ballies thomas prat gilbert murison philp of Dunbrek
seriand and vthiris sindry

The samyn dai It was fundin and deliuerit be ane sworne assise thomas of marr' for
spekar of the samen that Johne menyeis on the behalf of his spous' sal content and pay
thom menyes xxiij s' vj d' for certane malt both fra him within terme of law exten
dand til j meil of malt

the assise forsaid has ordanit / that gif James of Kintor and his wif wil sweyr
that thai borowit nocht fra patrik andirson ane goldyn lew and twa xiiij penny
grotis thai salbe quite of the said patrikis clame And falyeand tharof to content him
within lachful tym. And the ballies has assignit to the said James tocum to
morn with his wif tofulfil the deliuerence of the assise

the action persewit be Alexander menyeis apon androw vaus of ij bollis of salt is res
platit quhil the law dai eftir paisch'

Item the determinacione of the borgh folowit be Johne of Kintor apon Johne ma
lisson anent iiij barellis of salmond / is continuit be the assise with consent of parties
in sic fourm and effect as this dai vnto the law dai eftir paisch' in hope of concord And
the parties has chosin thomas fife John' the vaus alexander reid and Johne Wormot til
accord thaim gif thai can in the meyn tyme - And the samen iiijor persons ar cho
sin til accord in like wis' the said Johne of Kintor and Dauid marr'

the law dai eftir paisch is assignit til Johne stevinson til ansuer' to the borgh strekin
apon him be Johne the vaus for the wranguis' haldin fra him of four' barellis of
salmond j bol of salt and of a tvnne hambre barel tocompt and rekning

the samen dai Johne the vaus oblist him for Johne chepman eldar tocontent and pay
til Johne Wormot fourty s' betuix this and viij dais before Witsundai next tocum
and j mark of vsuale money be this tyme twelf moneth' . but langare
dilay / for the releving of alexander scrogis of the souerty in the quhilk the said Johne
chepman drew him til John' Wormot

The samyn dai Comperit before William blindsele and Johne stevinson twa
of the ballies of abirdene sittand in Jugement / Philp quhitehede and Elene
hervy his spous' / and grantit thaim tilhaf analijt sauld and assignit
til a honorabil knycht ser Johne ruthirfurd of tarlan aldirman or abirdene
al right and clame of right that thai had or mycht haf in and to twa
landis togiddir liand within the said burgh in the gallougate on the eest
part of the samyn betuix the land of vmquhile Wat pyot on the
southe part / and the land of Androw Kympty on the north' part / And ane
annuel rent of ten schillingis yerlie tobe rasyt oute of Thom litstaris
land liand in the galougate togiddir with al ayrschip pertening to the
said Elene be the deces' of marion' rolland hir modir as in a contract vndir
instrument made in edinburgh' . mare fullely is contenit And attour the forsaidis
philp and elene his spous' . as of before has sald' analijt and assignit to the
said knycht . the forsaid landis annuel Rent and airschip with the pertinencis oblisand thaim
the grete bodely aith' sworn nevir toreuoke the samyn vndir the pain of ane
hundreth pundis tobe pait to the said knicht his ayris or assignais or thai
be herd in Jugement as in Instrument tayn tharuppon of ser Johne striuelin notar'
mare fullely is tobe contenit

The xxj dai of marche the yer' of god et cetera lxxxv Johne stevinson ane of the ballies
of Abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samyn gert cal James of Kintor and his wif
todepone be thare athis like as it was ordanit be the assise twiching ane
goldyn lew and twa xiiij penny grotis clamit be patrik andirson And the said
James comperit and deponit be his aith that he borowit nocht fra the said patrik
the forsaid lew and grotis / and his wif comperit nocht / quharfor the said patrik
protestit that in defaute of comperance of the said James of Kyntoris wif and of hir
deposicion that he was cumin til his clame of the said lew and twa xiiij penny
grotis eftir the deliuerence of the assise made tharuppon'

The xxij dai of marche In the tolbuthe before Johne stevinson ane of the ballies
Robert crag producit for witnes philp andirson and scottis thomas quhilkis the gret
aith sworn in presence of copyn andreis skippar deponit togiddir with the said robert
sworne in like wis' anent j barel of salmond clamit be him apon the said skippar
that thai with the said skipparis barnys put in the said skipparis bote j barel
of salmond of the said robertis

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per prepositum et balliuos in pretorio eiusdem
tercia die Aprilis anno Domini mo iiijcmo lxxxvjto quo die secte vocate et curia affir
mata burgenses extramanentes absentes et amerciamenti patent infra videlicet patri
cius lesly Alexander clerk in Daviot thomas strath Johannes fuchil Robertus senyour

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisicionem
div.p:
Alexander menyeis Johannes de Knollis Johannes de culan Johannes Wormot thomas
prat Dauid symson andreas murref senior Robertus prat Ricardus hil Willelmus Kyntor
Walterus achneve Johannes gregory Willelmus necolson . Robertus blindsel Johannes
lison Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus mathoson frater Alexandri mathoson
latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem dominj
nostri Regis de quadam terra cum pertinenciis Jacente infra burgum de Abirdene in
vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem inter terram heredum quondam Johannis Wode
ex boriali parte et terram quondam cristinj litstar ex australi parte Et quod dictus alexander
est legitimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Willelmi fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
et quod est legitime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum xl s' et tantum
valuit tempore pacis / Et quod tenetur de domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgale / Et quod
nunc existit in manibus eiusdem domini Regis legitime per se ipsum ob mortem dicti quondam
Willelmi mathoson per spacium trium mensium aut eocirca In defectu veri heredis Jus suum
minime prosequentis

Eodem die accedens ad barram henricus leith de bernys protestacionem fecit in for
ma Juris pro vno annuo redditu decem solidorum sibi hereditarie debit' de quadam
terra quondam Roberti Wormot Jacente subtus montem castri huius burgi ex parte boreali
eiusdem inter mare sive fluuium ex australi parte et terram Dauidis mathei ex occidentali
parte Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
presentavit in curia coram ballivis tanquam prima die huius processus Testibus thoma
narn Johanne cowy et moricio besat seriendo

Item the said henry leith of bernys has constitute Alexander reid ser Alexander voket and
Johne the vaus coniunctlie and seueraly his procuratouris topersew and folow be proces'
of law in tym tocum the forsaid land / and to recovir possession and properte of the samen
in faute of payment of the said annuel / promittand to hald ferm and stable et cetera

Eodem die Religiosus vir frater petrus striuelin minister domus Sancte trinitatis de
Abirdene protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu triginta denariorum eedem
domuj et sibi debit' de quodam orto vasto iuxta dictum locum sancte trinitatis Jacente ex
parte orientali cimiterij eiusdem ex vna et torrentem sancte trinitatis ex parte australi partibus ex
altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil inuenit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
presentavit in curia tanquam prima die huius processus testibus thoma chepman Roberto
talyour et Duncano stralogh seriendo

Item eodem die dominus Johannes striuelin capellanus ac procurator altaris Sancte Katerine protestatus
fuit pro annuo Redditu quinque solidorum eidem altari debit' de quadam terra Jacente
in vico viridi vt patet in rotulamentis precedentis Ad quam terram accedens nichil inue
nit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam tercia die huius
processus Testibus seriando et testibus immediate precedentibus

Johannes stevinson super quem Johannes vaus extendit plegium pro iniusta detencione iiijor
barellarum salmonum vnius bolle salis et vnius vacue his barelle ad bonum computum
primo die vocatus ad respondendum dicto plegio / non comparuit quare precipitur moricio besat seriendo
quod capto districto ab eodem ipsum summoneat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum
diem huius placiti sive processus

The samen dai Elene martyne procuratour and factour til maistir Androw cadiow
hir spouse comperit before the aldirman and ballies in Jugement and be virtu of
the said procuratory producit vndir the said mastir Androwis seal and writin with his hand
scho askit fra Alexander chavmer of murchil the sowme of xxv merkis of the vsuale mo
ney of scotland of this terme of paisch' eftir the tenour of his contract made til
hir said spous' tharuppon' And protestit in his name for remede and priuilage of
law in defaute of payment et cetera

Item the said Alexander chavmer eftir that Elene martyn gert reid hir power' of procuratoury /.
perofferit tomak payment til hir husband mastir Androw cadiou or his lagh
ful procuratouris this dai / and allegit that it was na laghful procuratoury that scho
schew in the said matir becaus' scho had na power' towyn and tyne And tharup
pon he askit ane sensment of the court And nochtwithstanding this allegians
he perofferit togif hir in payment of the samen that scho askit / wol beer' nolt
or scheip how thai ar prisit or thocht wourth be certane sworn' men tharto And
for waiknes of the court the ward tueching the procuratoury was deferrit
quhil Wednisday the v dai of this instant moneth and the parties warnit tocum
that dai to here the court deliuer tharuppon'

the said dai Anent the borgh' persewit be Johne of Kintor apon John ma
lisson of the wranguis' intrometting with four' barellis of salmond / the assise
fand Johne malisson quite of the wrang / bot thai haf decretit and orda
nit that he sal mak compt rekning and payment til the said Johne of Kyntor
of four' barellis of salmond' within terme of law And William blindsel
ane of the ballies gert ane seriand lay wand on John' malisson' and
charge him toremain in the tolbuthe quhil he set souerty til make the said
payment et cetera

Item the assise forsaid has deliuerit and ordanit that John' of Kyntor sal mak
a papar' and compt rekning and payment til Dauid marr' of twa bar
rellis of salmond' . and xvj s' g' within lagh'ful tyme
Johannes portar posuit se in voluntate prepositj pro foristallacione pellium et amerciatur

Johannes thomson dictus slugy convictus per assisam amerciatur pro foristallacione lane et pellium et assisa
posuit in Juramento ipsius Johannis regratacionem denariatorum in patria et noluit Jur
et cetera est in amerciamento pro regratacione

It is statute be the Aldirman ballies consel and communite that al oute burgessis salcum
remayn within this burgh' within xv daies vndir the pain of tynsale of thar fredom
And this is proclamit at the merket cors and thocht expedient for certane causis
considerit be the toune et cetera

Item thai haf ordanit that for a yer' na cordonar' salby hidis bot the horn' and lug
gis be elike lang And quha beis fundin doand the contrar' the hidis or the price
salbe eschete to the tayntar' / and the aldirman sal accuse thaim of foristalling

the samyn dai ser Dauid vaus chaplan of Sanct mary magdalenis altar askit
a balye topas and gif him possession of a land in the greyn recuverit be him
in the hede court eftir paisch a yer bipast eftir the tenour of his process' and dome gevin
tharuppon And becaus' androw branche allegit that the said land pertenis til him and that
he offerit payment of the annualis bigain sa fer as he acht todo til the said
ser Dauid / the ballies be the decreit of the court has delayit the gevin of the
said possession in sic fourm and effect as it is in this dai vnto Wednisday next tocum
withoute preiudice to the said ser Dauid / and the parties ar warnit toproduce thare
documentis and richtis that dai as thai wilbe servit

In the court haldin be William blinsel ane of the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe
the v dai of aprile the yer' et cetera lxxxvj / the assise ordanit gif Duncan William nory wil
cum here and sweyr that the malt bocht fra him be Sande cowparis wif and vthiris
for plackis / that the condicion was made for plackis it sal stand as payment
And gif he wil swere that he was nocht content of plackis / scho sal mak him
payment of samekil as scho had of the laid of malt And this is ordanit
tobe done quhat tym the man cumis to this toune

the same dai It was decretit and ordanit be the court and pronuncit til Androw
branche that he mon pay and content til ser Dauid vaus chaplan of sanct
mary magdalenis altar the annualis . acht til the said ser Dauid of a land in
the greyn recoverit be him be process' of termis bigain or than preve him pait
this dai / or than . that a bailye sal pas to morn with the said ser Dauid and gif him
state and possession of the said land eftir the tenour of his process'

the Aldirman and counsale has gevin and grantit til ser Androw ettale chaplan the
keping of the ferdyn apon his gude bering and seruice making / and that
he salhaf twa merkis in the yer' tharfor tobe pait of the bred be the maistir
of the kirk wark

The vij dai of aprile forsaid . In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin in the
tolbuthe before the aldirman and Wilyeam blindsel ane of the ballies of the samen
It was decretit be the court that patrik andirson is cumin til his clame againnis
James of Kintor of a goldin lew and twa xiiij penny grotis / becaus' that the said Ja
mes and his wif com nocht togiddir toswere anent that lew and grotis like as it
was gevin furth be ane assise and falyeit tharin / And that the said James sal
content and pay the said patrik of the said lew and twa xiiij d' grotis within terme
of law

The viij dai of aprile et cetera lxxxvj In the balye court / Johne ranaldson convict be assis
in amerciament for the wranguis' haldin of a laid of malt fra mariory chamer quhilk
scho bocht be j d' of arlis and ordanit to restore the malt Als' the said John' is in amer
ciament for strublance of the said mariory and sal amend as law wil

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the x dai of aprile forsaid
thomas prat as procuratour and factour in that part til thomas Jaksoun citiner' of Saintandrow
askit fra Johne more payment of four' barellis of salmond of the rest of xij ba
rellis be vertu of his obligacion and of our Soueran lordis lettrez direct tharuppon in the
quhilk obligacion the said Johne togiddir with William more and alexander nachty ar bundin
coniuntlie and seueraly renunciand the benefice of diuision' / And the said Jhone more saide
and allegit that he was desesit of the said obligacion be ane act made til the said thomas
Jakson' be William more quhare throu thar was innouacion maid of the said obligacion
and askit ane decision' of the court tharuppon . The quhilk John' removit and in like
wis' thomas prat procuratour for thomas Jakson' / and the said Act sene and vndirstandin . The
court wardit and decretit the said Johne more quyte of the said thomas Jaksonis
clame of the said four' barellis of salmond / and desesit of his obligacion' be Innoua
cione maid as forsaid is

the assise has ordanit anent xvj s' clamit be Johne of lammynton' fra thomas symson
that the balyeis sal ger the officeris pas to fyndlau fores hous' and poynd and
distres him for xij s' of the said some' quhilkis he was ordanit topay of before
and todistres the said thomas for iiij s' / and make the said Johne of lammynton' be
content and pait of the xvj s'

Duncan leis in the name of mariory his spous' is oblist tobring the chartiris of the
newburgh clamit be Alexander liel as procuratour til Anne stokar' before the
aldirman ballies and consel in the tolbuthe on thurisdai next tocum / gif thai can
nocht accord tharuppon in the meyntyme / toremayn in the common' kist quhil it be
decidit quhom to thai suld be deliuerit

John' the ross' in amerciament for the wrangwis' haldin of a caldron' fra Wil vmfra and
is ordanit be assis' to restore the samyn
Thomas gardner in amerciament throu his awne graunt for breking of the paas' of breid

Custuma vxor Walteri meirnys et vxor Johannis cowy amerciantur per confessiones proprias
pro infrictione assise ceruisie vendendo pro viij d'

The xiij dai of aprile the yer' et cetera lxxxvj in the court haldin be William blindsel ane
of the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe / the said balye of the autorite of his office be the
decrete of the court has delayit the action persewit be alexander liel againis Duncan
leis and his wif anent certane chartiris in sic fourm and effect as it is this dai vnto the
morn for waiknes of the court / And the said Duncan is chargit tobring the char
tiris with him than like as he was oblist

The xiiij dai of aprile In the balye court / Wil blithe fleschar' grantit him awand til
Androw branche x s' be him self / and that he becom borgh to the said androw for xx s' anent
Sande lammynton' the quhilk xx s' togiddir with the x s' he is chargit be the ballies
topay or mak be pait within terme of law

the samen dai Duncan leis brocht before the Aldirman ballies and diuers' of the counsale
twa chartiris of the landis in the newburgh togiddir with a letter testimonial concerning the Junct
feftment of mariory his spous' like as he was oblist the quhilkis chartiris and lettre testimonial
the aldirman deliuerit to me to remain in the common' kist / quhil it be decidit quhom to thai
suld be deliuerit becaus' the counsale was waik todecide tharuppon this dai / And
the parties ar ordanit tobe lach'fully warnit before the said chartiris and lettre testimonial
be deliuerit oute of the common' kist tosee the deliuerence of the counsale tharuppon'

Duncan stokkar' and his wif ilkan of thaim in amerciament for strublans of thom of meldrum
and his wif / And the said thomas in amerciament for strublans of the said Duncan

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xv dai of Aprile forsaid
It was ordanit be ane assise and forbiddyn / that in tyme cuming Johne the ross' baxtar
sal bere na wauppynnis vndir nycht sic as ax swerd or vthir fenssabil waup
pynnis for certane causis considerit be thaim . vndir the pain of tynsale of his fredum . bot gif
he be chargit be the officeris And for the said Johne the ross' William futhes is becumin law borgh that William vmfray
salbe vnschathit in tym cuming vthirwais than law wil / And the said William vm
fray has fundin thom symson law borgh for him that the said John' the ross' salbe
scaithles in like wis' Attour' the assise has ordanit gif it happynnis the said
Johne the ross' in tym tocum to forfaute againis William vmfra or his brudir maistre
William . like as he has done of before / that he sal pay v merkis to Sanct
nicolace wark / And that he sal do alsmekil sted and seruice to thaim as he has
done thaim grevans et cetera

The samen dai comperit before the ballies in Jugement Sande lammynton' and
grantit him toreleve Wil blithe fleschar' of the borowgang that he drew him
for / til Androw branche for xx s'

Item the assise has ordanit for the strublans made be Duncan stokkaris wif of thom
of meldrum and his wif / that gif scho be fundin sic a rebellour' or strublar' againis
the said thom of meldrum in tym cuming / that scho salbe tane and harlit in the cukstule and
syne bannyst oute of this toune for hir demeritis

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die mensis
Aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxxxvj /

quo die Johannes stevinson secundo die vocatus ad sectam Johannis
vaus non comparuit / quare precipitur moricio besat seriando quod capto districto ab eodem / Ipsum summo
neat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium diem huius processus

the samen dai thomas symson strekit ane borgh in the hand of Alexander chavmer seriand that
Alexander sanchar' wrangwisly withhaldis fra him ten barrellis of smal salt quhilkis he
grantit him awand before Johne stevinson ane of the ballies and vthiris witnes / And the
seriand is ordanit towarn the said alexander again Wednisday toansuer' to the said thomas

the ballies be the decreit of the court has ordanit a seriand to warn Wil litstar'
tocomper' before thaim on Wednisday next tocum as dai peremptour til ansuer' to the
challans of Johne fichet anent a leid / this action is continuit to thurisdai the xx dai
or aprile throu auctorite of the ballies for waiknes of the court

Anent twa bollis of salt clamit be Alexander menyeis fra androw vaus / the assise has
ordanit / that the said androw sal content and pay him ane of the said bollis / and be quite of the
tudir at thare request
Androw Watson is convict be ane assis' for the forstalling of wol and skyn'

the samen dai comperit before the Aldirman and consel ser John striuelin chaplan of Saint
Johne the ewangelistis altar and desirit at thare mastirschippis that thai wald graunt
the patronage of the said altar til ony nichbur' of the toune that wald eik it and
mak it a hail festment / And than Johne Wormot allegit that the progenitouris of
the Kintorris war patrownis of the said altar / and askit this dai xv daies to
schaw document tharuppon . And the aldirman and consel grantit him the said dai
to the schawin of the samyn

The samyn dai the Aldirman and counsale riply avisit . has gefin and grantit
the patronage of Sanct Johne the baptistis altar' til Johne of Knollis
and his ayris mail he ekand the said altar' in condigne feftment of sex fyve
markis he giffand state and possesssion of the samen sex v merkis to ser Alexander vocat
thare luvit chaplan And the said ser Alexander tobrouke and ioyis' the new
feftment togiddir with the auld . for al the daies of his life And the said John'
of Knollis sal bynd the perpetuale chaplan of the samyn altar til continuale
residens in the qveyr in his feftment tobe maid tharuppon. And falyeand' of the for
said John' of Knollis and his airis maile the said patronage salcum again to the gift
of the aldirman consale and communite of this burgh et cetera

the said dai comperit before the aldirman ballies and consel Androw branche and askit
ane balye topas and stand beside him tosee the breking of a stait of a land
in the grene gevin til ser Dauid vaus / and tharuppon thai avisit continuit
thare deliuerance in the said matir quhil this day xv dais And the aldirman sayd
til androw branche gif he thocht it war preiudice or hurt til him sa lang delay
that he mycht tak a notar' and pas to the said land and do that efferit of law
anent the breking of the said state et cetera

Item the said dai the outeburgiez' and in speciale thir of the quhilkis the names ar
vndirwritin oft tymis callit to here thaim depriuit of thar' fredum becaus' thai
com nocht toremayn within this burgh' like as it was ordanit eftir the fourm of
the act / and proclamacion made tharuppon comperit nocht / that is tosay Wil richart
son duelland besyde banf Androw mvrison in rettre Wil of carnequhyn John'
of fochil in the parrische' of methlik Dauy rury in monymusk Androw gilquho
in the parische' of fethirneir androw brekach in monymusk alexander scot in marr'
Johne Watson in govil tom Watson thare Duncan of cardny in echt Wil
of garriach yungar in skeyn Alexander scherar' in balvany alexander Watson in achor
thy Wil andirson in Kairnfochil thom strath' in vchtirles androw colly in fivy alexander
clerk in Davyot Wil gray in Methlik' and Johne portar in bothelny

Item Wilyeam blindsel ane of the ballies chargit Johne of Kyntor tomak
compt rekning and payment til Dauid marr' of ij barellis of salmound
and xvj s' g' optenit apon him be the said Dauid / eftir the fourme of the
ordinance of the assise maid tharuppon et cetera
